faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to secure a SAIF Zone license?
items.answer: Our expert business consultants help you secure your SAIF zone trade license within 1-3 business days.

items.question: Can I apply for visas under a shared desk or flexi-desk package?
items.answer: Yes, SAIF allows you to apply for up to 6 visas with flex-desk or shared desk options.

items.question: What are the benefits of setting up in Sharjah Airport International FZ?
items.answer: Launching your free zone in the SAIF Zone offers complete foreign ownership, zero corporate taxes, and easy access to local and regional markets.

items.question: Do I need to be physically present in the UAE to register my company?
items.answer: No, SAIF offers a 100% remote business setup, allowing you to launch without being physically present in the UAE.

items.question: Do I have to register my business for taxes in the Free Zone?
items.answer: While the FZ offers complete corporate and personal tax exemptions, you’ll have to register your company with the FTA to stay compliant with the UAE’s regulatory requirements.
